channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Simple Table Manager
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Simple Table Manager

item.title: CVE-2023-4858|2023-11-06T20:41:21.712Z -- unknown -- simple%20table%20manager
item.description: The Simple Table Manager WordPress plugin through 1.5.6 does not sanitise and escape some of its settings, which could allow high privilege users such as admin to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks even when the unfiltered_html capability is disallowed (for example in multisite setup).
